chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Great Aunt Sumi, p. 41 (34)—Someone Yukiri makes up. She thinks someone needs to mediate between the Ajahs soon or the rebels would “dance in through the front door, bold as theives, and empty the house while the rest of them squabbled over who got Great Aunt Sumi's pewter.”
